definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc

sentences.english: Enhance and maintain LANs and WANs to ensure proper level of service.
sentences.chinese: 提高和维护局域网和广域网，以确保服务的权限。

sentences.english: NAT: No interface selected to send packet to internet.
sentences.chinese: 没找到可发送包的广域网口。

sentences.english: Still, WWAN can be more convenient, more reliable and easier to set up.
sentences.chinese: 无线广域网更方便更可靠更易上手。

sentences.english: Adds a city or a segment on a wide area network to your diagram.
sentences.chinese: 在网络图中添加城市或广域网网段。

sentences.english: Offers routing services to businesses in local area and wide area network environments.
sentences.chinese: 在局域网以及广域网路环境中为企业提供路由服务。

sentences.english: WAN Network Places, you can search the computer on the Internet, very good.
sentences.chinese: 广域网网上邻居，可以在网上搜索电脑，非常好的。

sentences.english: A hash-value based scheme for wide area service discovery is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于散列值的广域网服务发现方案。

sentences.english: Design, setup, maintenance and backup of office Local Area Network and WAN.
sentences.chinese: 办公室局域网和广域网的设计，装置，维护和支持。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)

pinyin: xu1 ni3 zhuan1 yong4 wang3 luo4
